I put in my two cents, I'll let Shom handle his defense from here.

hint- the council may comprimise if theres STATED limits to 
teleporting and energy useage for doing so.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> In a message dated 7/21/00 8:50:54 AM Pacific Daylight Time, 
> cyberwolf4@p... writes:
> 
> << Teleportation should be restricted based on range not banned. 
Skywarp 
>  could teleport short distances, the beast machines mirage can too, 
>  try to use this input before making a final judgement. >>
> 
> 
> Yes, yes, yes I know very well about Skywarp.  Hell, they even had 
Starscream 
> do it once that I saw in "Divide and Conquer", but the point is, 
I've 
> personally spoken to Yanshosh about this subject a few days before 
my 
> vacation, and he said it was illegal.  Hence, it being illegal.  
>     Of course, the person who was doing it, no offense intended, 
was zipping 
> almost magically into battles and other important stuff with no 
real way of 
> knowing it.  But, if you'd like to try and make a compromise, e-
mail the 
> Council as a group:
> 
> Yanshosh@a..., Inferno731@a..., JP3884@a..., KSLawDogg@c...
> 
> 
> 
> Lord Unitron
> KSLawDogg@c...
